name: Bounce! (Levi Henry)
description:
a quick game that involves bouncing as high as you can and collecting as much coins as you can!

a recreation of the scratch game that i made ages ago!

scratch version - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/511504879/

instructions:

up arrow (HOLD) - bounce on trampoline and to jump on the grey platforms

left/right arrows - move left and right
